modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod turns loose ammo into bundles. Adds gascanBundle, RocketHE and RocketFragBundles and JunkTurretBundles.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod turns loose [ammo](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) into bundles. Adds gascanBundle, RocketHE and RocketFragBundles and JunkTurretBundles.

**Changelog**

* **_(new)_** Update to A19
* Corrected exploding arrows to 75 (From 100 to match vanilla)
* Changed ammogasbundle from 100 to 1000
* Added localization.txt thanks to Dancapo

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/Stallionsdens%20Ammo%20Bundle%20Maker)**

If you appreciate Stallionsdenâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](http://paypal.me/AnthonyCar78).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19911-stallionsdens-and-valmars-a19-mod-thread/).

**Credits:** [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/)
